meanings.definition: A furnace or oven used to produce lime by burning limestone.
meanings.sent1: The workers loaded the limestone into the limekilns to start the production process.
meanings.sent2: The old limekilns by the river have been abandoned for many years.
meanings.sent3: Why did the ghost choose to haunt the limekilns? Because it wanted to add some spice to its afterlife!
meanings.sent4: The limekilns stood tall like ancient guardians, watching over the valley.
meanings.sent5: The intense heat of the limekilns turned the limestone into valuable lime.

meanings.definition: A structure or building where lime is produced by heating limestone.
meanings.sent1: The company invested in new limekilns to increase their lime production.
meanings.sent2: Visitors were amazed by the historical limekilns preserved in the museum.
meanings.sent3: The limekilns threw a party and invited all the other buildings to join in the fun!
meanings.sent4: Her determination burned as fiercely as the fires in the limekilns.
meanings.sent5: The limekilns hummed with activity as the workers prepared another batch of lime.
